Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'd really like to see some sort of basic backgrounding for every craft so that it can perform basic tasks (eg. scanning for / mining kethane, etc) even when it's not actively flown. Of course this should only be implemented as seperate thread (like one for all crafts) to prevent game slowdown.

Cheers.

i really like this idea! i has annoyed me so many times, not to be able to for example let a probe scan on it's own.

and since no physics would have to be loaded .. the game wouldn't slow down a lot i think ( i could be wrong of course ._. )
I believe this is planned for when resources are added.

I believe this is planned for if resources are added.
